1. Open the preference page and go to Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to Internal Editors section (still no selection made) and press OK.

Expected behavior: The selected external editor should be added to the associated editors list without a visible change in the selection state.
